page.title: 06LAW AND ORDER IN EASTBOURNE
page.content:
The summer of 1985 has seen an outbreak of street disturbances in Eastbourne. These have occurred when the Night_Clubs have closed at around 2a.m. They have resulted in assaults on the police and damage to property and parked vehicles. The police have claimed that the offences are drink related.A number of people have appeared in court,some received fines of up to Â£300 and a few have received custodial sentenecs. The police have also expressed concern about the level of under_age drinking which is taking place in the town.
Alex Whilde.
